items.name: Fivda / Robin (KodamaSounds / COUNTERFEST RECORDS)
items.description: I've worked and collaborated for years with Daniel - and I hope that we will keep it at it for years to come. Daniel is a very mindful individual that knows how to stay grounded within the reality and scope of your projects, and will do everything he can to bring life and soul to some of the most complex and often overlooked sides of music production. KodamaSounds' identity and strength could come along only thanks to his numerous song contributions, mixes, and technical expertise. If you're looking for quality and someone to listen, you need a Daniel.

items.name: YOKAI (KodamaSounds)
items.description: Daniel mixed and mastered my latest album with great care, and the result exceeded my expectations! I’m very happy to have been able to create this CD with him, as he is an attentive listener and always gives his best. Very approachable, he’s open to discussions about key mixing decisions and can also bring the creativity you’ll need during moments of doubt. I highly recommend his work, of course for electronic music, but also especially for metal sounds, where he brings out the energy and dynamics for an optimal result!
